page.title: 05FURTHER EDUCATION I
page.content: This is provided for students in agriculture and horticultural subjects at{LACKHAM COLLEGE of AGRICULTURE.}The college is based on the old Lackham Estate which was purchased by the {Wiltshire County Council}in 1946 as a school which was later renamed as a college. At the time of this survey it has 230 Full Time students, 38 Technical staff, 7 Farm staff, 6 Garden staff and 42 Ancilliary staff. The courses cover all aspects of {farming, horticulture and home {economics,}where students receive both academic and practical training. An extensive agricultural library exists within Lackham House which also houses the administration section. Various outbuildings both new and converted house the various studies.
